They were to lure it to a solar system without any life and banish it to the void. The fairest of them consented to be the tribute. It came, and immediately began to engorge itself on her. So fixed on such a prize as she, it lost all awareness around it, and the old races were given the chance to complete the ritual that sealed it in the gap between dimensions; but it came at a cost, for the maiden was trapped in the void with the beast for all eternity.

They wept for a very long time. their tears eventually brought life to the planet, and they disappeared into space. This story is for adults only. If you are under the age of eighteen, please leave. If you don't like my stories, don't read them!

If you add a decent chapter to my story, I will add a chapter in response, or add to your story.

Meaning, these objects or creatures can somehow get or grow arms, legs, eyes, a mouth, or some cock and balls. They can also change their, or other humans sizes.

No images anyone under 18 please. There can be images of Adults, but not of kids.

Things that I like and are encouraged are nudity, all kinds of sex, voyeurism, oral vore, aliens, invisibility, time travel, haunted houses, underage stuff, demons, any kind of apes, giantess, giants, robots, shrinking, pregnancy, anthros, death, zombies, and monsters.
